plot: An homage to the spanish director Bigas Luna, with images of him and his voice over in two italian shows as a painter and one location on the set of Bambola with Jorge Perrugoria and Valeria Marini.
title: Homenaje a Bigas Luna
plot_es: An homage to the spanish director Bigas Luna, with images of him and his voice over in two italian shows as a painter and one location on the set of Bambola with Jorge Perrugoria and Valeria Marini.
plot_en: An homage to the spanish director Bigas Luna, with images of him and his voice over in two italian shows as a painter and one location on the set of Bambola with Jorge Perrugoria and Valeria Marini.
